incident_updates.body: We experienced an event affecting our network infrastructure in YNM. Start time : 05/02/2025 16:56 UTC Start time : 05/02/2025 16:58 UTC Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 04/02/2025 08:00 UTC End time : 04/02/2025 21:00 UTC Service impact : Servers in this rack will be unavailable for a maximum of 13 hours. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some cooling system replacement and upgrade. The maintenance may be completed in less time than expected, and we are committed to minimizing the outage duration. Thank you for your understanding.
